body: Great work Mostapha and team! I am currently working on similar work but in Grasshopper which I hope to release this summer as a plugin for GH for multi-objective optimization problems using Octopus. The potential of visualizing data using a web-based app is greater and I hope to combine what you have done here with the work I have done as well -  it would be pretty cool! Attached is what I have been able to achieve so far:
